Datasets and code for the preprint: [Theory of Mind and its elusive structural substrate](10.31219/osf.io/5pf2h).

Please let us know if something in the code is incomplete or files are missing or you have any problems.

## About

The present study is the result of the analysis from Pragmatic language database project. In here, we explored the cortical thickness and volume from a Mexican population sample and its relation with theory of mind metrics.
